Rr7povAInwQ-90.text: it's a theory. It's not a real thing you can ever achieve. We, as journalists go out and gather a bunch of information and facts about a thing, and then we sort of land somewhere on what we think about that topic. And our journalism, our story, is gonna reflect that decision. But what you can do as a fair journalist is you could be generous to the other side.
